name: Masters of the Universe: He-Man: Defender of Grayskull
synopsis: Skeletor and his evil warriors have found a way to breach the Mystic Wall that protects Eternia and attack the sacred land. Now it's up to He-Man and the Masters of the Universe to push back the evil beasts to the Dark Hemisphere. Take control of He-Man's magical sword and awesome strength as he fights--on foot and in vehicles--against wave after wave of enemy attacks. All the characters from the Masters of the Universe animated series clash in this epic fight of good and evil.
